title: OruvanukkE uyir
sahitya:
oruvanukkE uyir vAzhgirEn en uLLanbai ellAm koLLai koNDa nAthan


anupallavi

  aruvAi uruvAi guruvAip-piriyA arivAgi engum niraiyum iraivan


caraNam    pArOrin urai naDai bhAvanaiyai pazhudaip-pEshi vINAip-pozhudaip-pOkkilEn
vErAna OmkAra sorUpan vigjnAna kalA vEndan parama shAntan
